function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level","Impact":"Potential reluctance to implement wearables in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Commitment to clinical trials by government and individuals","Technologies":"Clinical trial monitoring and data gathering systems","People":"Healthcare beneficiaries, government","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","Impact":"Compromised data security and privacy","Mitigation":"Secure data storage, access control, and defined user accountability","Technologies":"Secure data storage systems, access control technologies","People":"Wearable device users, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Barriers to innovation due to regulatory procedures","Impact":"Delays in approval and delivery of new medical devices","Mitigation":"Streamlined regulatory approval processes and emergency use authorizations","Technologies":"FDA-identified devices, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Manufacturers, healthcare beneficiaries","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, government"}]}
